name: @deep-foundation/npm-automation
description: A package that will help you to automate actions related to npm and your deep package.

scripts.build:
npx fse remove dist --quiet && tsc && (npx prepend-file --file-path='./dist/npm-pull-cli.js' --content='#!/usr/bin/env node
') &&(npx prepend-file --file-path='./dist/npm-release-cli.js' --content='#!/usr/bin/env node
') && (npx prepend-file --file-path='./dist/npm-install-cli.js' --content='#!/usr/bin/env node
') && (npx prepend-file --file-path='./dist/npm-sync-dependencies-cli.js' --content='#!/usr/bin/env node
')
